apps.localizedDescription:
Packed with humor, puns and goofy parodies, this game will make you question everything you thought you knew about golf! It is a silly physics-based golf parody where each level is a new surprising type of golf. Some brilliant or hilarious, others so absurd you will ask yourself: WHAT THE GOLF?

IT’S REALLY NOT GOLF

But it’s a lot of other things! Cats, couches, horses, cars, TV’s, tennis, dogs, flags, flying houses, a fax machine… You name it, we golf it!

EXPLORE THE LAB

What has happened in the golf lab? Why is it called a hole-in-one and not a house-in-one? Are there really no limits to what you can golf?

WANT MORE? WE GOT YOU

New episodes dropping/released often, you can already check out:

It’s Snowtime: An epic adventure of frozen pizza and pineapple

A Hole New World: Golf, now with holes!

Sporty Sports: Where all the sports are golf!

…and many more to come!

Updates for special holidays, including:

International Cat Day (Catch the laser!)

Halloween (A tricky little treat)

World Maritime Day (That one was “aboat" time)

Thanksgiving (Because turkeys are the only birdies you need!)

Valentines Day (A love story between a horse and a golf ball)

…and more!

DISCLAIMER!!

This game is made by people who know nothing about golf. It will NOT make you a better golf player!
apps.name: WHAT THE GOLF?
apps.subtitle: Surprising and hilarious
apps.versionDescription:
APRIL FOOL'S IS COMING UP!

In celebration of our favorite holiday, we left a little something here for you guys...So be sure to play the game around April 1! I'll give you a hint: Our new favorite inspirational quote is: "Live, Laugh, Loaf"

NAILED IT!

We also nailed a bug fix or two. Yay, us!

apps.localizedDescription:
Welcome to the official Balatro+ game!

Hypnotic and endlessly satisfying, Balatro is a magical mix of card games like Solitaire and Poker, that lets you twist the rules in ways never seen before!

Your goal is to beat the Boss Blinds by making strong poker hands.

Find new Jokers that change the game and create awesome and exciting combos! Win enough chips to beat tricky bosses, and find hidden bonus hands and decks as you play.

You’ll need all the help you can get to beat the big boss, win the final challenge, and win the game.

Features:

* Each run is different: every pick-up, discard and joker can dramatically alter the course of your run.

* Multiple game items: discover over 150 Jokers, each with special powers. Use them with different decks,upgrade cards and vouchers to boost your scores.

* Different Game modes: Campaign mode and challenge mode for you to play.

* Beautiful Pixel Art: Immerse yourself in the CRT fuzz and enjoy detailed, hand-crafted pixel art.
apps.name: Balatro+
apps.subtitle: When Poker Meets Solitaire
